item.description:
We are following up our Tapas Night with a wonderful presentation on the history and culture of Spain. We are very fortunate to have Rafael Osuna-Montanez lead this informal lecture followed by a discussion period. Rafael is a Graduate Fellow in Hispanic Studies at Trinity College in Hartford. He also organizes the Latin American and Iberian Film Series. His half hour presentation will be in Spanish. English Speakers - don't be intimidated - it's a wonderful opportunity to sharpen your language skills, and we can help each other out.

We will begin our evening as usual at 7 pm chatting and sharing a pot luck dinner. Please bring a dish to share! The lecture/discussion will begin at 7:30 followed by the discussion.

Please note: There is a limit of 25 people, so sign up soon. There is no "maybe"option.

!Nos vemos!

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Trinity College teacher, Rafael Osuna-Montanez, gives lecture on Spain
